title: Looking for Plats for ranked team.
body:
Pretty much just want to make new mates and see how far we can go on the ladder. Want plats+ for everyone to be a similar rank.
Just need skype or teamspeak add me in game if you want to
ign:chicks chase elo
Skype: Lancelot1234561

replies.body:
I'm keen
adc main > support 

skype john.mccormick1984
